snippet: The funeral for Ackeem Green, a 25-year-old member of the Harlem Youth Marines, took a religious and somewhat political tone as gun violence and the community's response to gangs were denounced.
abstract: The funeral for Ackeem Green, a 25-year-old member of the Harlem Youth Marines, took a religious and somewhat political tone as gun violence and the community's response to gangs were denounced.

headline.main: A Military-Style Funeral for a Young Man Killed on Harlem Streets
